title: Follow live: Round 1 of the 2025 NBA draft
description: Tune in to ABC and ESPN to watch how the first round of the NBA draft plays out.

title: Mavs take Flagg at No. 1: 'A dream come true'
description: The Mavericks selected Duke forward Cooper Flagg with the first pick of the 2025 NBA draft Wednesday night.
author: Tim MacMahon

title: Murray wants to shield kids from 'damaging' social media
description: Sir Andy Murray says he is trying to protect his children from "damaging" social media platforms as he supports more action following Katie Boulter's BBC interview.

title: Elliott is England U21s 'man for the moment' amid uncertain club future
description: Despite a frustrating season with Liverpool that has left his future in doubt, Harvey Elliott showed his talent with a matchwinning display to send England Under-21s into a second successive Euros final.

title: Stokes hails 'unbelievable' Duckett as England make more Headingley magic
description: England captain Ben Stokes hailed Ben Duckett's outstanding performance as the hosts made more magical memories at Headingley.

title: England-India player ratings: History-maker Pant and match-winner Duckett star
description: England pulled off their second-highest run chase in Test cricket to beat India in thrilling fashion in the first meeting at Headingley, while the visitors became the first side to lose a Test despite scoring five centuries - so here's how we rated the players from both sides...

title: Jacob Lopez continues hot stretch with 7 innings in the Athletics' 3-0 win over the Tigers
description: Jacob Lopez pitched seveninnings and Nick Kurtz hit a three-run homer to help the Athletics beat the Detroit Tigers 3-0 on Wednesday night. Lopez (2-4) gave up three hits and a walk, striking out six to improve to 2-0 with a 0.82 ERA in his last four starts. Jack Flaherty (5-9) took the loss, allowing three runs on five hits and four walks in six innings.
author: DAVE HOGG

title: Mavericks fans start 'Fire Nico' chant at NBA draft party before Cooper Flagg pick
description: The Dallas Mavericks defied all odds by landing No. 1 pick Cooper Flagg in the NBA draft, but fans are still irate at GM Nico Harrison.
